column1: Finish with my woman cause she couldn't help me with my mind.
People think I'm insane because I am frowning all the time.
All day long I think of things but nothing seems to satisfy.
Think I'll lose my mind if I don't find something to fight by.
Can you hear me?
Can't you feel my brain?
Oh yeah.
I need someone to show me the things in life that I can't find.
I can't see the things that make true happiness.
I might be blind.
But there's no way I can do them.
I don't believe in walls I opened.
I always used them in my life to show the things that I got and earn it,
the these things that I don't yield to,
the the things that I little don't have,
the things that I can'tLY provide.
I am free again!
And you will laugh and I will cry
Happiness I cannot feel
And love to me is so unreal
And so as you hear these words telling you now
I won't fight state
I tell you to enjoy life
I wish I could burn through light
